thread.title: Alvin Patrimonio's death a hoax; wife says PBA legend just underwent checkup
thread.title_full: Alvin Patrimonio's death a hoax; wife says PBA legend just underwent checkup

title: Alvin Patrimonio's death a hoax; wife says PBA legend just underwent checkup
text: Alvin Patrimonio's death a hoax; wife says PBA legend just underwent checkup By Leif Sykioco (philstar.com)   1:04pm MANILA, Philippines â€” Alvin Patrimonio is not dead. The Purefoods Star Hotshot's manager is alive and well according to his wife, Cindy Conwi-Patrimonio. "I appreciate your concerns. He had a check up lang that was it," she posted on her Facebook account Friday. News about Patrimonio's passing due to cardiac arrest spread quickly online, confounding netizens. The report even said Cindy confirmed the passing to a radio program. Netizens took to Twitter to express their confusion. is it true that alvin patrimonio is dead???
